settings.paragraph_text: Slow Ageing Essentials is formulated from the highest quality natural ingredients and maximises the profound anti-oxidant and preservative effects of essential oils to actively optimise the skin’s natural ability to heal itself. Free radicals, unstable oxygen molecules can damage cell structure leaving skin lack-lustre and dull, anti-oxidants in our bespoke essential oil blends neutralises them to minimise and stop this impact.

settings.heading_text: “In order to look your best on the outside, you have to feel your best on the inside”
Our story - a lifelong dedication to understanding how to slow the effects of time on skin
“Energy is everything - Slow Ageing Essentials optimises your skin's natural ability to renew itself”

settings.title: Pioneers of modern natural beauty
settings.text:
SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS IS THE CULMINATION OF A LIFE-LONG DEDICATION TO UNDERSTANDING THE AGEING PROCESS AND ITS EFFECTS ON THE SKIN.

We are mindful that we live on a finite planet that we must not pollute. We are conscious that our bodies are finite too, so we try not to contaminate either. Slow Ageing Essentials has been created through our own understanding of how to nourish the skin and is part of our personal holistic approach to eating well, exercising regularly and enjoying restful sleep. Our desire is to share our experiences and knowledge for the benefit of others. Slow Ageing is not simply about the finest quality formulations but a lifelong mission that will help keep you healthy, fit, mobile and younger… as a way of life.

DAVID AND MARGOT LIEBER, FOUNDERS, SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS

settings.title: Real Beauty Credentials
settings.text: SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS IS THE PINNACLE OF 40 YEARS SPECIALIST KNOWLEDGE OF BEAUTY, WELLBEING AND THE POWER OF ESSENTIAL OILS.

settings.title: 40 years expertise distilled
settings.text: David Lieber has been involved in health, beauty and wellbeing his whole life. This passion led him to own and run health clubs, gyms and spas where he was at the forefront of creating wholly holistic experiences for his clients. David transformed the French aromatherapy skincare brand Decléor and helped build it into the global brand it is today. Alongside he has followed and trained in the Chinese arts of Tai Chi and Qui Gong - holistic systems of coordinated body posture, movement, breathing and meditation translated as 'life energy'. It’s the distillation of this integrity, dedication and knowledge, which is poured into every drop of Slow Ageing Essentials.

settings.title: Wisdom and Well-being
settings.text: Margot Lieber has been an advocate of wellbeing and healthy living long before it became mainstream. Born in Columbia, her Grandparents lived off the land; her Grandfather growing fruit trees and Grandmother sourcing natural remedies and helping to deliver babies in the local community. At the age of 16 Margot discovered a yoga book in her father's collection and it was this that changed the course of her life. Moving to California, she worked with Deepak Chopra at his wellbeing centre, ultimately training as a yoga teacher and ayurvedic health practitioner. Margot has developed her own personal mind/body mantra, channelling this philosophy into Slow Ageing Essentials and her daily life.

settings.heading_text: Margot’s Top 5 recommendations for living the Slow Way
settings.paragraph_text:
Make the effort for selfcare, to have personal rituals, time to apply Slow Ageing Essentials.

Commit to a daily flowing exercise that you love

Always remember to hydrate in the morning and through the day

Eat as close to nature as possible

And something that is free is good sleep, aim to go to bed before 11.

settings.heading_text: "5 steps to a slow a way of life"

settings.paragraph_text:
SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS HARNESSES YOUR INTERNAL ENERGY PATHWAYS AND ENSURES THEY ARE WORKING IN HARMONY.

Daily routines allow us to create this space for presence and purpose.  The application techniques of Slow Ageing Essentials are designed to massage the pressure points and meridian lines forming a lifting and rejuvenating facial massage as well as creating a daily guided meditation.

settings.title: Skin and Life in Balance
settings.text:
SLOW AGEING IS ENERGY, IT IS VITALITY, IT IS STRENGTH

The philosophy of Slow Ageing Essentials is based on increasing energy levels through the entire body by embracing a holistic approach to well-being. In order to look your best on the outside, you have to feel your best on the inside. 

“celebrate long term graceful health”

Enhance its skin-boosting effects by following a lifestyle that incorporates self-care, a balanced, anti-oxidant rich diet – with lots of fresh water – regular gentle exercise and plenty of restful sleep. All of this will show on your skin; it will simply look better.

settings.title: Create bedtime routines to encourage restful nights
settings.text:
SLEEP RESTORES AND HEALS THE WHOLE BODY

Try to create a consistent bedtime routine that in turn leads to healthy sleep.  The hours before midnight are the most beneficial and waking up at a similar time daily is key. Turn your bedroom into a place of peace, whatever your environment make it somewhere you love to retreat to. The most effective Slow Ageing Essentials Skin’ergy Massage you can do is at nighttime.  This is when taking the time to repeat each movement 24 times not only gives amazing benefits to your complexion but also it becomes your own personal ritual, a treat at the end of the day. And finally no technology.  Put everything at least out of arms reach or at best out of the room entirely.

“Sleep is free and the most restorative treatment for our whole bodies, but it can be elusive, create your own bedtime rituals to encourage restful nights”

settings.title: Place importance on what goes on to your skin
settings.text:
SKIN IS OUR BIGGEST ORGAN IN THE BODY, IT IS OUR FIRST LINE OF DEFENCE AND PROTECTION.

This permeable layer absorbs essential oils into the epidermis, dermis and blood stream. It is therefore vital that we place the same importance on what goes onto our skin as what we put into our bodies.  

“Slow Ageing Essentials optimises your skins natural ability to renew itself.” 

Slow Ageing Essentials contain bespoke blends of only the purest and most potent essential oils; these are the life force of botanicals and have been chosen for their skin boosting benefits. Easily absorbed, they actively improve the quality of skin cells, neutralising free radicals and encouraging optimum new skin cell growth – this means a more radiant, vital and luminous complexion. Each product can be applied using our ‘Skin’ergy Self-Massage Regime’ that employs the power of touch to stimulate acupressure and meridian energy pathways. This cleanses toxins out of the dermis whilst stimulating more blood, oxygen and nutrients to the surface of the skin. You can see the benefits - a stronger, plumper and more energised complexion.

settings.cta_label: Slow the effects of time on your skin

settings.title: Skin’ergy
settings.text:
SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS REDUCE THE EFFECTS OF TIME ON YOUR SKIN AND GIVE SKIN A RADIANT MORE VIBRANT GLOW.

Our four products are stringently dermatologically tested to ensure they are kind to skin and suitable for all skin types and ages. They are for all people who wish their skin to look its very best, every day.

settings.title: “Harness nature’s lifeforce”
settings.text:
ESSENTIALS OILS + THE HEART OF OUR BRAND

The energy and life force of plants, they enable us to connect with nature. The synergy of our bespoke protected formulations works harmoniously to give skin luminosity, as if ‘lit’ from inside. The science of essential oils is well documented. They are absorbed deeply into the skin where their powerful anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory and anti-microbial properties work to revive and renew skin, cell by cell.

settings.title: Only the most vital ingredients
settings.text:
SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS USE THE VERY BEST PUREST 100% NATURAL ESSENTIAL OILS, EXTRACTS AND BOTANICALS.

“Harness botanicals potent natural energy”

Every ingredient is meticulously sourced and carefully combined to boost the skin’s ability renew, strengthen cells and promote elasticity and a more vital complexion. Blissfully fragrant, all our botanicals are carefully and slowly distilled in order to preserve their unique properties.

Our formulations contain exacting amounts, precisely combined to utilise the power of some of the most potent natural actives.

settings.heading_text: “We aim to protect two environments; our bodies’ internal one and that of our precious planet”

settings.paragraph_text:
We use the finest glass packaging to reduce our environmental impact.

We do not use single use plastic.

To minimise our packaging footprint we do not box our products.

We wrap our products in a reusable cloth beauty bag instead.

We are proudly British, manufacturing our products in the UK.

We use sustainably sourced, 100% pure essential oils and naturally derived ingredients.

We continually look at how we can improve!

settings.title: Move your body daily
settings.text:
FIND A MOVEMENT YOU LOVE AND COMMIT TO IT DAILY.  CELEBRATE WHAT YOUR BODY CAN DO.

Tai Chi, Qui Gong, Walking, Swimming; Regular exercise can make you happier by increasing production of endorphins, which help to produce positive feelings and reduce anxiety levels.

“Energise, strengthen and take care of our bodies”

The body also detoxifies via perspiration and circulation improves. Engaging in an activity you enjoy increases energy levels and provides anti-oxidant protection as well as promoting blood flow, which can protect skin and delay signs of ageing. Exercise can also help your memory and brain health as well as relaxation and sleep quality

settings.content-title: Take time to eat and hydrate well
settings.text:
EAT AS CLOSE TO NATURE AS POSSIBLE; THE NUTRIENTS IN OUR FOOD ARE THE FUEL FOR OUR BODIES AND NOURISHMENT FOR OUR CELLS.

Aim to make food delicious. Eat whole foods in their most natural form and variety. Fill at least half your plate with colourful, high-fibre vegetables and include bright fruits like berries. These contain plenty of anti-oxidants and phytochemicals (plant based, naturally health boosting compounds), which contribute to your health in an infinite number of ways.

Make water your new favourite drink! Start your day by hydrating your body with a large glass of water containing the juice of ½ a freshly squeezed lemon, or just plain water. Drink at least a litre of water a day.

settings.content-title: Margot’s Top 5 recommendations for living the Slow Way
settings.text:
Make the effort to be healthy, have personal routines, enjoy time to apply Slow Ageing Essentials.

Commit to a daily exercise that you love

Remember to hydrate first thing in the morning and throughout the day

Eat as close to nature as possible

Finally something that is completely free; conscious breathing and quality sleep – the hours before midnight are the most restorative

“It's never too early to begin or too late to start”
Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.

SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS REDUCE THE EFFECTS OF TIME ON YOUR SKIN AND GIVE SKIN A RADIANT, MORE VIBRANT GLOW.

Each product is stringently dermatologically tested to ensure it is kind to skin and suitable for all ages and skin types. They are for anyone wanting their skin to look its very best, every day, for all their life.

The Slow Ageing Essentials products work in harmony to ensure the best possible results. Enhance their benefits by following our 'Skin'ergy Self-massage application' to ensure the formulas are absorbed deeply and to energise and exercise the muscles of the face.

100% NATURAL PRODUCTS CAN LOSE THEIR POTENCY OVER TIME AS THEY DEGRADE - SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS DO NOT.

We use stunningly beautiful deep violet glass, that is scientifically proven to block damaging UVB and UVC light. The revolutionary packaging preserves the oil’s effectiveness, ensuring the last drop is as potent as the first.

settings.text:
THE SLOW AGEING ESSENTIALS COLLECTION IS A NEW PARADIGM IN NATURAL SKINCARE.

Just 4 powerful products means you no longer have to ask ‘what do I need for my skin’. They have been developed to work in unison, each product performing a specific function and working perfectly with each other. The products share a signature range of the finest quality essentials oils that work in synergy to fight the free radicals that damage cell health and age our appearance. Illuminate your skin from the inside out, give your complexion a radiant vital glow and energise your appearance, we call it Skin’ergy!

settings.title: The Slow Ageing Collection
settings.text: Receive a complimentary Essential Face Wash when you buy the collection.

settings.heading: Discover the Collection
settings.text: A COMPETE SKINCARE RANGE, UNIQUELY FORMULATED TO LEAVE YOUR SKIN FEELING SOFTER, SMOOTHER AND RADIATING AN ENERGETIC GLOW. WHEN YOU BUY THE COLLECTION TOGETHER RECEIVE A COMPLEMENTARY ESSENTIAL FACE WASH WORTH £35.

A NEW NATURAL BOTANICAL SKINCARE REGIME FOR ALL SKIN TYPES AND AGES.

This beautiful range of only the most essential products will transform the radiance of your complexion, help to slow the effects of time on your skin, whilst boosting your natural energy levels and enhancing your feelings of inner calm.

“Inner Beauty, Outer Beauty, Lasting Beauty”

settings.title: Welcome to Slow Ageing
settings.text:
A NEW NATURAL BOTANICAL SKINCARE REGIME FOR ALL SKIN TYPES AND AGES.

This beautiful range of only the most essential products will transform the radiance of your complexion, help to slow the effects of time on your skin, whilst boosting your natural energy levels and enhancing your feelings of inner calm.
IT'S WRITTEN ALL OVER YOUR FACE

YOUR ‘DESERT-ISLAND’ DAILY MIRACLE WORKER, FOR SKIN THAT’S IN PERFECT BALANCE (TURBOCHARGES THE RADIANCE FACTOR OF MOISTURISER TOO).
A POWER-MAGNET FOR HYDRATION – FOR A PLUMP, CUSHIONY COMPLEXION WITH A DAYLONG GLOW & SMOOTHNESS LIKE NO OTHER.
AN OVERNIGHT RADIANCE RESTORER THAT TRANSFORMS ALL SKIN TYPES INTO SMOOTHER, SOFTER, SUPPLER & MORE ENERGISED VERSIONS OF THEMSELVES.

settings.cover_text: 4 steps to 5 star skin ***** Each developed to work in perfect synergy; Illuminate your skin from the inside out, give your complexion a radiant vital glow and energise your appearance, we call it Skin’ergy!

settings.text:
“Invest just one minute into the future of your skin!”

Everyone wants their ‘best ever’ skin. The Slow Ageing range is compact but our ‘4 to flawless’ collection of products can be used in many different ways to bring out the very best in your skin. Whatever your age or skincare concern, our simple Skin’ergy Consultation takes less than 1 min to give you your personalised results and the perfect product combination for achieving 5-star skin. Just tick your skin type, click on how it behaves, your main skincare goal and how much time you have to instantly receive a tailor-made recommendation.

settings.heading: Our Bestseller
settings.text: Discover the power of our Facial Essence to help enhance the skin’s elasticity, relax fine lines and stimulate skin renewal to reveal a glowing complexion. Our current best selling product from the range
